title: Gemini â€” AI Tool Review
description: Gemini is Google's multimodal AI assistant, deeply integrated with Google Workspace, capable of processing text, images, audio, video, and code. Google Gemini is a family of multimodal AI models (Gemini 1.5 Pro, 2.0 Flash) powering Google's AI assistant. It features a 1 million token context window in Pro, real-time Google Search grounding, and deep integration with Gmail, Docs, Drive, and YouTube. Gemini Advanced includes the most capable models via Google One subscription. Highlights: Real-time Google Search integration. 1M token context (Pro). Multimodal: text, images, audio, video. Google Workspace integration. Free tier available.
